title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Nevske of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Yampolivka, Torske of Donetsk region. Russian avi...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Nevske of Luhansk region and Terny¸ Yampolivka, Torske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Yampolivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
